ComicInfo.Title: The Road to Damnation, Part 5
ComicInfo.Summary: Hell has come to Texas. Literally! Kazaan has gone and done it. He's unleashed the cream of the Inferno, the greatest fiends of the Pit, onto the mortal soil. How does the Ghost Rider hope to contend with an endless swarm of demons?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-22 16:00:14. [CVDB143508]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Clayton Crain, Clayton Crain, Clayton Crain
ComicInfo.Editor: Axel Alonso, Joe Quesada, Warren Simons
ComicInfo.Characters: Buttview, Daniel, Father Adam, Ghost Rider (Blaze), Gustav, Hoss, Jemima Catmint, Kazann, Malachi, Ruth
ComicInfo.Locations: Dallas, Hell, Mephisto's Realm, Texas, The Moon
